import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { SearchService } from './services/search.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { constructor(private searchService: SearchService) { } openSlideBar() { // use boolean for opening and closing the slide bar // create another component for slide bar make it fixed or sticky position and absolute } }
